title: Insurance by the State, counties, and municipalities
context: ยง386-128 Insurance by the State, counties, and municipalities. The State, any county or other political subdivision of the State, and any other public entity within the State which is liable to its employees for compensation, may insure with any authorized insurance carrier. [L 1963, c 116, pt of ยง1; Supp, ยง97-127; HRS ยง386-128]
